name: super-potion
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 50 HP.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Restores the HP of a POKéMON by 50 points.
flavor_text.emerald: Restores the HP of a POKéMON by 50 points.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A spray-type wound medicine. It restores the HP of one POKéMON by 50 points.
